description: This file defines an employee recruitment workflow with multiple agents for screening candidates, scheduling interviews via Zoom, and sending emails. It includes classes for modeling candidate data and methods for extracting text from PDFs, as well as the main workflow logic.

classes.name: ScreeningResult
classes.description: Model representing the screening outcome for a candidate, including name, email, score, and feedback.

classes.name: CandidateScheduledCall
classes.description: Model representing the scheduled interview call details, including candidate info, call time, and URL.

classes.name: Email
classes.description: Model representing an email with subject and body.

classes.name: EmployeeRecruitmentWorkflow
classes.description: Workflow class orchestrating candidate screening, interview scheduling, and email communication.

methods.name: extract_text_from_pdf
methods.description: Downloads a PDF from a URL and extracts its text content.

methods.name: run
methods.description: Main method executing the workflow: screening candidates, scheduling interviews, and sending emails.
